item.title: Katy’s Cat Cafe offers coffee, dessert and adoptable cat snuggles
item.description: Katy’s Cat Cafe is located at 1490 Boulevard of the Arts in Sarasota. It’s open Monday - Friday, from 8:00am to 8:00pm. And on the weekends, Saturday and Sunday, 10:00am to 10:00pm.

item.title: Annabelle Kemper looking to go out on top in senior season with Lady Seminoles
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Southeast High School’s (SEHS) Annabelle Kemper. She’s a senior and one of the stars of the Lady Seminoles volleyball team.
